idealOutput: DevOps teams are no longer confined to cloud data centers. In industries like manufacturing, logistics, and healthcare, real-time decision-making at the edge has become the new standard. But with opportunity comes complexity. NeoCloud EdgeSync was built to eliminate that friction. With centralized orchestration and zero-latency pipelines, EdgeSync enables your infrastructure to think and act instantly — without compromising security or observability. In this article, we'll explore how edge computing is reshaping system design — and how your team can stay ahead of the curve.
